questions.question: I have an existing patology that got incredibly worst during the last days, I am afraid I won't be able to leave. Will the insurance reimburse my trip?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy does not include coverage for trip reimbursement due to medical conditions or existing pathologies worsening. The available provisions focus on contractor obligations, documentation requirements, and premium payment rules (Art. 12, 13), but no medical coverage is referenced in the provided context.
